texts.title: Bhagavad Gita
texts.description: The sacred dialogue between Lord Krishna and Arjuna, part of the epic Mahabharata

texts.title: Upanishads
texts.description: Ancient Sanskrit texts that contain the main philosophical concepts of Hinduism

texts.title: Ramayana
texts.description: Epic tale of Lord Rama by sage Valmiki

texts.title: Yoga Sutras of Patanjali
texts.description: Classical text on yoga philosophy and practice

texts.title: Vedas - Rigveda
texts.description: The oldest of the four Vedas, containing hymns, philosophical discussions, and instructions for rituals

texts.title: Vedas - Samaveda
texts.description: One of the four Vedas, comprising melodies and chants for ritual worship

texts.title: Vedas - Yajurveda
texts.description: One of the four Vedas, containing ritual formulas for worship

texts.title: Vedas - Atharvaveda
texts.description: One of the four Vedas, containing spells, charms, and metaphysical texts

texts.title: Mahabharata
texts.description: One of the two major Sanskrit epics of ancient India, containing the Bhagavad Gita

texts.title: Puranas
texts.description: Ancient Hindu texts eulogizing various deities, especially Vishnu, Shiva, and Brahma

texts.title: Bhagavata Purana
texts.description: One of the eighteen Mahapuranas, devoted to the glory of Vishnu and his incarnations

texts.title: Shiva Purana
texts.description: One of the eighteen Mahapuranas, devoted to Lord Shiva

texts.title: Brahma Sutras
texts.description: A key text in Vedanta school of Hindu philosophy, summarizing the teachings of the Upanishads

texts.title: Devi Mahatmya
texts.description: Hindu text describing the victory of the goddess Durga over the demon Mahishasura

texts.title: Devi Bhagavatam
texts.description: One of the Mahapuranas devoted to the Great Goddess (Devi)

texts.title: Vishnu Sahasranama
texts.description: A list of 1,000 names of Vishnu, one of the main deities in Hinduism
